Example
Return a String that represents certain characters of a char array:
char[] myStr1 = {'H', 'e', 'l', 'l', 'o'};
String myStr2 = "";
myStr2 = myStr2.copyValueOf(myStr1, 0, 5);
System.out.println("Returned String: " + myStr2);
